From Cookie gurl to Koala,

Hi, so I've been thinking about telling you how I feel many times. And then I started to wonder why I wanted to do that when it's obvious that we can't be together, even if I don't have a bf. So let's start with how I fell into you. As I said, it was because of your pure soul. I'd say it's a beautiful soul, with just some flaws that I don't mind very much. You've helped me to change myself. Along the way of getting tough, I may have mistaken "neglectful" with "tough" and many other things. But knowing you made me realise all of that. So thank you a lot. And while I believe it's better to keep these feelings for myself, the only reason for me to reveal this secret is to show you how your beautiful soul has changed me. We both know you have some flaws, but things need time to be completed. I somehow feel sad for not being the one who can complete you (sr for my selfishness lol I'm always like that :v) but I believe that someone's outside there can understand you, love you, accept your flaws and complete you. So be sad for no longer, cuz who you are is already very beautiful. Again, tks for making my summer wonderful. No matter what happens, I hope we would always be good friends like this, I may sometimes send you my favorite instrumental pieces cuz you're one of those rare friends who can share this weird taste of music and books and movies with me. And pls know that I'm always here for you whenever you need. Live well, I know you deserve that more than anyone <3

Impossible

Falling out of love is hard
Staying far from you is worst
Broken heart and broken mind
I know, I know

Thinking all I need is you
Building faith on love and words
My brain now is full of you
You know.

And now 
When all is done
There is nothing to say
You have gone and so effortlessly
You have gone
I want go ahead tell you

Tell you all I know now
Shout it from the roof tops
Write it on the sky line
All we had is gone now

I realize I'm happy
To stand by you in three years
Now my heart's been broken
Tell me what's happening should be
Impossible
Impossible
Impossible
Impossible...
_______

To T1316
